metadata.title: CVE-2024-46818 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Check gpio_id before used as array index[WHY & HOW]GPIO_ID_UNKNOWN (-1) is not a valid value for array index and thereforeshould be checked in advance.This fixes 5 OVERRUN issues reported by Coverity.
